data_deletion_completed.title: Deletion Completed
data_deletion_completed.description: All data related to your server has been successfully deleted. Formify will now leave the server.

thank_you.title: Thank you for your feedback
thank_you.description: If you have any detailed suggestions for improvement, feel free to use {0} to let us know.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description:
**User**
`{user}` -> User Mention
`{user.name}` -> Username + Tag
`{user.username}` -> Username
`{user.discriminator}` -> User Discriminator
`{user.avatar}` -> User Avatar URL

support.title: Are you looking for help?
support.description: Our [support server]({0}) is the best place for all formify questions. You can even participate in the development and suggest new features.

invite.title: Invite Formify
invite.description: To invite me to your Discord server, just open my profile and click `Add to Server`.

only_owner.title: Missing Permissions
only_owner.description: Only the server owner can subscribe to our newsletter

created.title: Thank you
created.description: Thanks for helping to improve this bot
